name: Flip Missile
description:
Flip Missile is a concentration based infinite runner with random generation. Click the screen to control the missile. Line up the colored fins with the gates it flies through to keep it from exploding.

Get the mobile version and challenge your friends!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kallan.MG

For more web fun check out Candy Run Saga a candy themed platformer.
